column5: Does anyone know where the nearest place to Ottawa to rent a decent fishing boat is? We normally rent at White Lake but it has been dead this year! Anyone have any suggestions? Thanks!

Ozilies  Petrie Island ...on the Ottawa  http://www.oziles.com/  Constance lake.....also rents boats, but it's small and you can cover it in 2 hrs!!  Try googleing Mississippi lake and see if anyone there rents boats.    http://www.riversidejam.com/lodging.htm
